archimate:Goal.name: Provide a data development repository avaiable across the enterprise
archimate:Goal.documentation: All project documentation relating to data development (e.g. business definitions, relationship diagrams, data architecture, system architecture, business logic, etc.) is planned, funded, completed, and passed on, published, or otherwise made available to the wider business audience in a central location, so that it may be accessed and referenced after the project comes to an end.
